issue.title: bullet dependency on quantal and raring collides with upstream ubuntu

content.raw: @gerkey @scpeters and I talked about this and for the debbuild we can disable the bullet dependencies in the control file.  If users want to use the experimental features they will need to build from source, but this will prevent collisions with the 2.80 version of bullet in quantal and raring, and hopefully saucy will have 2.81 or higher.
content.html: @gerkey @scpeters and I talked about this and for the debbuild we can disable the bullet dependencies in the control file. If users want to use the experimental features they will need to build from source, but this will prevent collisions with the 2.80 version of bullet in quantal and raring, and hopefully saucy will have 2.81 or higher.
